original: sam kshipta pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta s'a dha nam /
analyzed: sam kshipta pradznya pa ra mi ta sa dha nam

original: mdor bsdus pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: mdor sdud ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sgrub thabs

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag tshal lo

original: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes su padma dmar po dang zla ba la gnas pa'i dh'i:ser po yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: sngon du ston ba cho gas stong ba nyid sgom ba rjes su padma dmar po dang zla ba la gnas ba dh:ser po yongs su gyur ba las

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo

original: mi bskyod pa dbus su gnas pa'i ral pa'i cod pan can ma /
analyzed: mi skyod ba dbus su gnas ba ral ba cod pan can ma
chos chad ba phyag rgya chang ma

original: po ti dang bcas pa'i autpa la sngon po g-yon logs su 'dzin ma /
analyzed: po ti dang cha ba autpa la sngon po g-yon logs su dzin ma

original: gos kyi stod g-yogs dang / na bza' dmar pos brgyan ma zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gos kyi stod g-yogs dang na bza dmar pos rgyan ma zhes byed ba

original: aom dh'i:shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dh:shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sva ha

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes byed ba sngags bzlas ba

original: mdor bsdus pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: mdor sdud ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sgrub thabs rdzogs so

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang khams ba lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris sgyur cing zhus
